subject: Rowing
lead_paragraph: HENLEY-ON-THAMES, England, July 7 (AP) — Harvard defeated Brown by two lengths Saturday to advance to the final of the Ladies Plate for elite eights at the Henley Royal Regatta.
snippet: HENLEY-ON-THAMES, England, July 7 (AP) — Harvard defeated Brown by two lengths Saturday to advance to the final of the Ladies Plate for elite eights at the Henley Royal Regatta.
